•   Member States’ many requests for action should be supported and the Regional Office needs to respond 
to questions regarding how most effectively to improve maternal health through measures which improve 
dietary and physical activity patterns. 
Based on the findings and the priority actions identified, Part III’s discussion of the opportunities for action on 
maternal, newborn and infant nutritional health in the context of Health 2020, has been developed to inspire
